thread.title: Kenya: Medics Go On Strike

title: Kenya: Medics Go On Strike
text:
Kenya: Aviation Union to Go on Strike 
Hussein said they have been pushing for health workers' hardship allowances,staff housing, medical cover, recreation centres in all hospitals, promotion and re-designation, but these have not been addressed by the county government. 
The doctors said that on June 1, Garissa Governor Nathif Jama met representatives from KMPDU and and Kenya National Union of Nurses and the governor directed the county public service board to engage the doctors on promotions, re-designation and signing and implementing the collective bargaining agreement. 
However, county secretary Mohamed Mursal accused union officials of playing politics with the health of residents. 
He said some of their demands have been implemented, while others are in the process of being effected. Kenya
